languages.text: "Может, то был морок от ритуальной эссенции. Может — воля Неумирающего. Я... тоже чувствовала нить между нами. Иногда мне казалось, что я чувствую тебя рядом. И от этого становилось спокойно".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, то был морок, насланный ритуальной эссенцией. Быть может — воля самого Неумирающего. Я... тоже чувствовала натяннутую между нами нить. Чувствовала, как она становится крепче. Иногда мне казалось, что я говорю, поступаю так, как поступил{mf||а} бы ты. И от этого становилось спокойно".

languages.text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."
languages.original_text: "Может, то был морок от ритуальной эссенции. Может — воля Неумирающего. Я... тоже чувствовала нить между нами. Иногда мне казалось, что я чувствую тебя рядом. И от этого становилось спокойно".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. There were times when it felt as if I was saying what you would have said, acting as you would have acted. It was... a calming feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when it seemed as though I was saying what you would have said, acting as you would have acted. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

"Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

languages.text: «Quizá lo que presenció fue por obra de la esencia del ritual. Tal vez fuera la voluntad del Inmortal que lo viera. Yo también percibí un hilo entre nosotr{mf|o|a}s. De hecho, hubo ocasiones en las que casi podía sentirl{mf|e|a} a mi lado. Era una sensación... reconfortante».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: «Quizá lo que presenció fue por obra de la esencia del ritual. Tal vez fuera la voluntad del Inmortal que lo viera. Yo también percibí un hilo entre nosotr{mf|o|a}s. De hecho, hubo ocasiones en las que casi podía sentirl{mf|e|a} a mi lado. Era una sensación... reconfortante».

«Quizá lo que presenció fue por obra de la esencia del ritual. Quizá fue voluntad del Inmortal que lo viese todo. Yo también percibí una especie de hilo que nos unía. De hecho, hubo ocasiones en las que parecía como si yo misma estuviese diciendo lo que usted hubiera dicho y haciendo lo que usted habría hecho. Fue una sensación... reconfortante».

languages.text: 「あなたが見たものは、きっと儀式のエッセンスによって引き起こされたものよ。不死の者の意思がそうさせたのかもしれないわ。私も、私たちの間の糸を感じたわ。実際、あなたがそばにいるような感覚を覚えることもあった。それは…心地のいい感覚だった」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが見たものは、きっと儀式のエッセンスによって引き起こされたものよ。不死の者の意思がそうさせたのかもしれないわ。私も、私たちの間の糸を感じたわ。実際、あなたがそばにいるような感覚を覚えることもあった。それは…心地のいい感覚だった」
「あなたが見たものは、きっと儀式のエッセンスによって引き起こされたものよ。不死の者の意思がそうさせたのかもしれないわ。私も、私たちの間の糸を感じたわ。実際、あなたが言いそうなことを私が言ってるように思えたこともあったし、あなたがしたであろう行動を私がしているように思えることもあった。それは…心地のいい感覚だったわ」

languages.text: “或许你所看到的一切是由仪式带来的，也或许是不死之神的意志让你看到了一切。我也一样，我也感觉到了我们之间的联结。确实如此，有好几次，我几乎能感觉到你就在我身边。这种感觉……很令人心安。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: “或许你所看到的一切是由仪式带来的，也或许是不死之神的意志让你看到了一切。我也一样，我也感觉到了我们之间的联结。确实如此，有好几次，我几乎能感觉到你就在我身边。这种感觉……很令人心安。”
“或许你所看到的一切是由仪式带来的，也或许是不死之神的意志让你看到了一切。我也一样，我也感觉到了我们之间的联结。确实如此，好多次我似乎都说出了你会说出的话，做了你会做的事情。这种感觉……很让人心安。”

languages.text: "Was Ihr gesehen habt, wurde vielleicht durch die rituelle Essenz bewirkt. Vielleicht war es der Todlose, der Euch sehen ließ. Auch ich spürte einen Faden zwischen uns. Es gab tatsächlich Zeiten, in denen ich Euch beinahe mit mir spüren konnte. Das war ein ... angenehmes Gefühl."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr gesehen habt, wurde vielleicht durch die rituelle Essenz bewirkt. Vielleicht war es der Todlose, der Euch sehen ließ. Auch ich spürte einen Faden zwischen uns. Es gab tatsächlich Zeiten, in denen ich Euch beinahe mit mir spüren konnte. Das war ein ... angenehmes Gefühl."

"Was Ihr gesehen habt, wurde vielleicht durch rituelle Essenz ausgelöst. Vielleicht hat der Wille des Todlosen Euch sehen lassen. Auch ich habe einen Faden zwischen uns gespürt. Tatsächlich wirkte es bisweilen, als würde ich sagen, was Ihr gesagt hättet, und tun, was Ihr getan hättet. Es war ... ein beruhigendes Gefühl."

languages.text: « Ce que vous avez vu était peut-être lié à l'essence même du rituel. Peut-être était-ce la volonté de l'Immortel de vous ouvrir les yeux. Moi aussi, j'ai senti un lien entre nous. Et parfois, j'ai eu l'impression de percevoir votre présence à mes côtés. C'est un sentiment... réconfortant. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que vous avez vu était peut-être lié à l'essence même du rituel. Peut-être était-ce la volonté de l'Immortel de vous ouvrir les yeux. Moi aussi, j'ai senti un lien entre nous. Et parfois, j'ai eu l'impression de percevoir votre présence à mes côtés. C'est un sentiment... réconfortant. »

« Ce que vous avez vu était peut-être lié à l'essence même du rituel. Peut-être était-ce la volonté de l'Immortel de vous ouvrir les yeux. Moi aussi, j'ai senti un lien entre nous. Et parfois, j'ai eu l'impression de dire ce que vous auriez dit, d'agir comme vous l'auriez fait à ma place. C'est un sentiment... réconfortant. »

languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."

traits.locale_text: Companions_Kibellah_85

languages.text: "Belki ayin özü sayesinde bir şeyler görmeye itilmişsindir. Belki de Ölmeyen'in iradesi sayesinde görebilmişsindir. Ben de ikimiz arasında bir iplik sezmiştim. Gerçekten de zaman zaman seni neredeyse yanımda hissedebiliyordum. Ki bu... Rahatlatıcı bir histi."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps what you saw was induced by the ritual essence. Perhaps it was the Undying One's will that made you see. I too sensed a thread between us. Indeed, there were times when I could almost sense you with me. It was... a comforting feeling."
